snippet: A free and increasingly popular iPhone app called Snapchat allows a person to take and send a picture and control how long it is visible by the person who receives it, up to 10 seconds. After that, the picture disappears and can't be seen again.
abstract: A free and increasingly popular iPhone app called Snapchat allows a person to take and send a picture and control how long it is visible by the person who receives it, up to 10 seconds. After that, the picture disappears and can't be seen again.

headline.main: Disruptions: Indiscreet Photos, Glimpsed Then Gone
headline.print_headline: Disruptions: Indiscreet Photos, Glimpsed Then Gone
